        Isglo Hotels Limited was incorporated in the year 2018, a Hotel with an unparalleled and stunning design, this “Hip” Luxury Boutique Hotel is in the heart of Ikoyi, Lagos, and offers an encounter like no other. Isglo has created a new paradigm in the Boutique Hotel experience that speaks to a sophisticated global audience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Waiter
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Guest Interaction: Welcome and seat guests, explain specials, answer menu questions, and make recommendations.
	Order Management: Accurately take orders (using notepad/tablet) and relay them to kitchen/bar staff.
	Service & Delivery: Serve food and drinks efficiently and professionally.
	Payment Processing :Prepare bills, handle cash/card payments, and process transactions.
	Dining Area Maintenance: Set tables, clear dirty dishes, and keep the area clean and organized.
	Teamwork: Coordinate with kitchen, bar, and other staff to ensure smooth service.
	Product knowledge:Ability to upsell products and has knowledge of sales.

	Excellent interpersonal, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and stand for long hours.
	Patience, professionalism, and a friendly demeanor.
	Basic math for handling payments and good coordination.
	Knowledge of food safety is often required.

	Prepare regular reports and dashboards to support management decision-making.
	Monitor sales data, performance metrics, and market trends.
	Collaborate with the sales and operations teams to identify areas for improvement.
	Ensure data accuracy and integrity across all reporting platforms.
	Support business planning and forecasting through data-driven insight

	Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Economics, Mathematics, Business Administration, or a related field.

Business Sales Assistant Job at OPPO




        
    

        
        OPPO, founded in 2004, is one of the world’s leading innovators in smart devices and mobile technology. With operations in over 60 countries and regions, Dedicated to delivering cutting-edge innovation, premium user experiences, and stylish designs. OPPO continues to expand its footprint with over 290,000 points of sale and 1,900 official service centers — bringing the beauty of technology closer to people every day

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Sales Assistant
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Business Sales Supervisor

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Business Sales Assistant to support our regional operations. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing day-to-day sales activities, handling customer enquiries, and coordinating logistics to ensure smooth and timely delivery of devices to distributors.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee and support daily sales operations within the region.
	Handle sales enquiries and provide accurate, professional, and timely responses.
	Coordinate with courier service providers to ensure prompt delivery of devices to distributors.
	Maintain and update accurate regional sales records and communicate updates to relevant stakeholders.
	Liaise with internal teams to resolve regional issues and improve overall service delivery.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or any related field.
	1–2 years of experience in a sales support or operations role.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.
	Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 per month.

Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvpool2021@oppo-aed.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
